channel.title: SciPy on Coding Blog By Arnab Kumar Shil
channel.description: Recent content in SciPy on Coding Blog By Arnab Kumar Shil

item.title: Reduce Build Time for Docker Image with Data Science Packages
item.description: If you want to use data science packages like numpy, scipy, pandas etc with your docker container and using pip to install them, then it will take forever to build the images. Because pip compiles the C extended code and that compilation needs a lot of time. For numpy it took me around 4 minutes.
